Html: I'm having problems getting a duplex service to work with my prism app. I've created a seperate app that does not use the prism framework and the service works fine. Is there anything I need to do differently when it comes to using duplex services with prism or modules.

Hi robbsmith,

 

Though Prism-v2 applications can publish and consuming to web services, Prism is does not provide any special features for web services as it address the UI composition problem. So, you should be able to use any service (duplex or not) as in any other .net application.

 

Is the service a WCF service? If that is the case, one little detail that I run into is where to place the app.config. Your question led me to post How-to: Consume WCF services from Composite Application Guidance (Prism-v2) Modules

If this was not the problem, what is the error you are receiving?

 

Hope it helps!
